duties_responsibilities.duty: Prepare and maintain financial records using QuickBooks to track company's assets, liabilities, profit and loss, and tax liabilities.
Responsible for accounts receivable and accounts payable, including depositing and recording client check receipts in QuickBooks.
Reconcile Accounts Receivable and Accounts Payable general ledger, as well as reconcile other balance sheet accounts as needed.
Support the Director of Finance with budgeting and forecasting processes, and assist with tax preparation.
Build efficiencies into internal processes and suggest process improvements to enable further growth.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in accounting or business, or equivalent experience (Master's preferred)
